result: The participant demographic information in the study includes 50 elderly individuals, consisting of 17 males and 33 females, with an average age of 77.1 years. Additionally, there were 50 young adults, including 25 males and 25 females, with an average age of 23.6 years. The study focused on analyzing the behavioral characteristics of these two groups based on their physical conditions and activities.
